page.title: 14COMMUNITY EDUCATION TUTOR
page.content: The Community Education Tutor helps adults who are returning to study subjects after leaving school many years ago. She arranges for them to join school lessons or adult education classes. She organises a short course to help them to get ready for lessons. Recently, she has also started a new course for mothers who want to return to work after having their family. Cranford Community School has over two thousand pupils. 1,200 are young people and the rest are adults. Most of the 'pupils' live in Cranford, Hounslow or Southall. Many pupils like the school because it is bigger and has more facilities than other schools. Lots of pupils have brothers and sisters in the school and some of their parents come to play sport and continue their education.
